Bazaarvoice Curation.name: Bazaarvoice Curation
Bazaarvoice Curation.description: Bazaarvoice Curation is a content curation service Bazaarvoice provides post it's acquisition of Curalate.

Covet.pics.name: Covet.pics
Covet.pics.description: Covet.pics is a customizable Shopify app for Instagram and Lookbook shoppable galleries.

Foursixty.name: Foursixty
Foursixty.description: Foursixty is a widget which turns Instagram content and user-generated content into shoppable galleries.

Nosto Visual UGC.name: Nosto Visual UGC
Nosto Visual UGC.description: Nosto Visual UGC (Earlier known as Stackla) is a cloud-based content marketing platform that helps discover, curate, display and engage with user-generated content across all digital marketing platforms.

Pixlee TurnTo.name: Pixlee TurnTo
Pixlee TurnTo.description: Pixlee TurnTo is a social UGC, ratings and reviews, and influencer marketing platform for community-driven brands.

Sniply.name: Sniply
Sniply.description: Sniply is a special URL shortener that allows to add a call-to-action to any landing page.

StoryStream.name: StoryStream
StoryStream.description: StoryStream is a content curation platform that specialises in user generated content.

Tagboard.name: Tagboard
Tagboard.description: Tagboard is a platform which allows users to aggregate data from major social networking websites and embed, repost and redisplay it on various media.

Tagembed.name: Tagembed
Tagembed.description: Tagembed is a social media aggregator that collects and displays engaging user-generated content from any social media network such as Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, Tiktok, Google Reviews, Airbnb, and 18+ networks.

ContentStudio.name: ContentStudio
ContentStudio.description: ContentStudio is an integrated cloud-based social media management and content marketing solution.

Contently.name: Contently
Contently.description: Contently is a SaaS content marketing platform from the company of the same name headquartered in New York.

MadCap Software.name: MadCap Software
MadCap Software.description: MadCap Software is a company that specialises in creating software tools for technical writers to author and publish various types of content, including user manuals, online help systems, and knowledge bases.

Olapic.name: Olapic
Olapic.description: Olapic is a content marketing tool specifically focused on visual marketing content.

Photoslurp.name: Photoslurp
Photoslurp.description: Photoslurp is a visual commerce platform that collects photos and videos of customers using your products from across social networks.

Scoop.it.name: Scoop.it
Scoop.it.description: Scoop.it is a content marketing software company based in San Francisco which provide content curation platform.
